perturbation.original_text: THIS AGREEMENT sets forth the terms and conditions agreed to between Chase Bank USA, N.A. (?Chase?) and you as an "Affiliate" in the Chase Affiliate Program (the "Affiliate Program"). Once accepted into the Affiliate Program, an Affiliate can establish links from the Affiliate's Website to [Chase.com]. Chase will pay Affiliate a fee for each approved credit card account that originates from a link in Affiliate's Website.
perturbation.changed_text: THIS AGREEMENT sets forth the terms and conditions agreed to between Chase Bank USA, N.A. (?Chase?) and you as an "Associate" in the Chase Affiliate Program (the "Affiliate Program"). Once accepted into the Affiliate Program, an Affiliate can establish links from the Associate's Website to [Chase.com]. Chase will pay Affiliate a fee for each approved credit card account that originates from a link in Associate's Website.
perturbation.explanation: The terms "Affiliate" and "Associate" are used interchangeably without clear definition. Section begins referring to parties as 'Associate' when they are legally defined as 'Affiliate', creating contradiction regarding who is being bound by the agreement.

perturbation.original_text: For purposes of determining Affiliate's Commission, an "Approved Account" means any Chase credit card application that is: (i) submitted by any user who clicks on an e-mail, banner or any other advertising material from Affiliate's Website; (ii) is approved by Chase; and (iii) is reported as approved by Chase to Affiliate.
perturbation.changed_text: For purposes of determining Affiliate's Commission, a "Qualified Application" means any Chase credit card application that is: (i) submitted by any user who clicks on an e-mail, banner or any other advertising material from Affiliate's Website; (ii) is reviewed favorably by Chase; and (iii) is deemed suitable by Chase to Affiliate.
perturbation.explanation: The term 'Approved Account' is replaced with 'Qualified Application,' and the criteria for approval/qualification are altered. 'Approved' is replaced with 'reviewed favorably,' and 'reported as approved' is replaced with 'deemed suitable,' creating ambiguity regarding the standards used for determining commissions.

perturbation.original_text: Affiliate agrees to place Chase's links provided by Linkshare NetworkTM which manages the Affiliate Program ("Links") on its Affiliate's website. Affiliate is responsible for obtaining prior written approval from the Chase Affiliate manager or Linkshare Network to link any or all other sites owned or managed by the Affiliate, other than the site that was approved at the time of original registration.
perturbation.changed_text: Affiliate agrees to place Chase's web addresses provided by Linkshare NetworkTM which manages the Affiliate Program ("Web Addresses") on its Affiliate's website. Affiliate is responsible for obtaining prior written approval from the Chase Affiliate manager or Linkshare Network to link any or all other sites owned or managed by the Affiliate, other than the site that was approved at the time of original registration.
perturbation.explanation: The term 'Links' is replaced with 'Web Addresses'. While similar, this lacks a clear definition and consistency with the rest of the agreement where 'Links' is the established term. This leads to confusion about the affiliate's responsibility.
